name: Twilight Reverie
description: Inspired by the enchanting moments of dusk in urban landscapes, the Twilight Reverie collection captures the essence of sophistication and creativity. Each piece is designed to empower women, blending sculptural silhouettes with vibrant hues that reflect the dynamic energy of city life.

name: Elysian Twilight
description: Elysian Twilight captures the enchanting spirit of urban evenings with sculptural silhouettes and rich hues that evoke the magic of dusk. This collection features luxurious fabrics and artistic details, designed for the modern woman who embraces her individuality and power in every moment.
theme: Inspired by the ethereal beauty of twilight in the city, blending artistry with empowerment.

name: Urban Luminosity
description: Inspired by the vibrant energy of New York City at twilight, Urban Luminosity features sculptural evening gowns and tailored separates that embody the boldness and elegance of the modern woman. Each piece is designed to empower individual expression while maintaining a commitment to sustainable luxury.
theme: Twilight-inspired elegance, celebrating the intersection of city life and artistic expression

name: Metropolitan Muse
description: Inspired by the vibrant energy of urban art and culture, the Metropolitan Muse collection features sculptural silhouettes and bold colors that empower women to make a statement. Each piece is designed to effortlessly transition from day to night, embodying the fierce spirit of the modern urbanite.
